name: Veggie Pesto Pasta
instructions: Salt eggplant and let stand for 20 minutes
Slice eggplant and zucchini thinly, ~0.5 cm thick, toss in oil, salt, pepper
Place eggplant and zucchini on baking tray and bake on top rack for ~30 minutes
In the meantime, slice onion, sausage, and red pepper
Heat a pan to medium heat and start a pot of water for the pasta
Cook vegetables in pan and add pasta to water, cook both for ~8-10 minutes
Drain pasta and combine all ingredients

additional_context.story: Tori and Jory lived together in university and Jory taught Tori how to cook on a budget. This was one of our go-to meals that was quick, easy, and delicious!
